div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _DependentCoveredPartyRoleType
Import all the codes that are contained in StudentRoleType

description.value: **Description:** A role recognized through the eligibility of a party to play a dependent for benefits covered or provided under a health insurance policy because of an association with the subscriber that is recognized by the policy underwriter.
